sections.heading: Terms, defined.For purposes of the School District Property Tax Relief Act:(1) School district has the same meaning as in section 79-101; and(2) School district taxes means property taxes levied on real property in this state by a school district or multiple-district school system, excluding any pro
sections.text: Terms, defined.For purposes of the School District Property Tax Relief Act:(1) School district has the same meaning as in section 79-101; and(2) School district taxes means property taxes levied on real property in this state by a school district or multiple-district school system, excluding any property taxes levied for bonded indebtedness and any property taxes levied as a result of an override of limits on property tax levies approved by voters pursuant to section 77-3444.SourceLaws 2024, First Spec. Sess., LB34, ยง 11.
